gcci.text: H100 procurement cycles extending to 6+ months as fab capacity prioritizes enterprise contracts over spot buyers.

gtpi.text: Mid-tier API providers undercutting incumbents by 40% through optimized inference architectures.

gagl.text: AI data centers consuming 12% of total grid capacity in major metropolitan areas, driving nuclear retrofit discussions.

aipi.text: Institutional investment patterns suggest AI infrastructure is transitioning from speculative to utility asset class.
